mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectComOvseaDlvZone Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ OVSEA_DLV_CST_PLC_SN , ZONE_TURN , ZONE_NM , ZONE_DSCR , USE_YN , REGTR_ID , REG_DT , UDTER_ID , UDT_DT FROM COM_OVSEA_DLV_ZONE WHERE 1 = 1 AND OVSEA_DLV_CST_PLC_SN = #{ovseaDlvCstPlcSn,jdbcType=NUMERIC} AND ZONE_TURN = #{zoneTurn,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
